DOC.brief_summary: Organ donor include study randomize control group intervention group receive 2.5 mg/kg cyclosporine A organ procurement . Harvested kidneys patient transplant chronic kidney insufficiency patient . According pretreatment transplant , delay graft function first week evaluate well kidney function different timepoints mortality first year transplantation .
DOC.brief_title: Cyclosporine A Pretreatment Kidney Graft Function
DOC.detailed_description: Organ donor include study randomize control group receive placebo intervention group receive 2.5 mg/kg cyclosporine A organ procurement . In operating theater organ harvest . Thereafter , harvest kidney patient transplant chronic kidney insufficiency patient . The management transplant patient perform usual . According pretreatment transplant , delay graft function first week ( need least one dialysis session ) evaluate well kidney function different timepoints ( slow graft function , estimate creatinine clearance day 3 7 , acute chronic graft rejection ) , length hospital stay mortality first year transplantation .
DOC.criteria: For organ donor : Male female age 18 70 year Brain death Inclusion criterion organ recipient : Male female age 18 70 year Indication kidney transplantation Informed consent For organ donor : Contraindication multiorgan procurement ( infection , cancer , etc ) Preexistent chronic renal failure . Refusal organ procurement donor ( confirm French national register report nextofkin ) . Exclusion criterion organ recipient : Need double kidney transplantation . Need multiorgan transplantation
